items.headline: The Supreme Court could rule on Trump’s tariffs as soon as Friday. Here’s how it could play out.

items.headline: Warner Bros. tells shareholders that Larry Ellison’s wealth isn’t enough to best Netflix bid
items.summary_en: Paramount’s latest offer, backed by Ellison’s personal fortune, remains inferior to Netflix’s accepted proposal, Warner Bros. says, urging shareholders to reject the hostile bid.

items.headline: ‘We track our finances religiously’: Are we obliged to pay for our daughter’s medical school? We have $2.6 million saved for retirement.

items.headline: U.S. jobs market not getting any worse — and it might even be getting better. ADP says businesses add 41,000 jobs in December.
items.summary_en: ADP said businesses created 41,000 jobs in December, suggesting a weak U.S. labor market showed mild improvement heading into the new year.

items.headline: The last bearish overhang for crude — Venezuela — is now gone. Why one trader says oil will follow in gold’s footsteps.
